                        startedAt: "string",
                    },
                    waiting: {
                        message: "string",
                        reason: "string",
                    },
                },
            }],
            message: "string",
            nominatedNodeName: "string",
            phase: "string",
            podIP: "string",
            podIPs: [{
                ip: "string",
            }],
            qosClass: "string",
            reason: "string",
            startTime: "string",
        },
    },
});
```

</pulumi-choosable>

                        message: string
                        reason: string
                        signal: 0
                        startedAt: string
                    waiting:
                        message: string
                        reason: string
            message: string
            nominatedNodeName: string
            phase: string
            podIP: string
            podIPs:
                - ip: string
            qosClass: string
            reason: string
            startTime: string
```

</pulumi-choosable>
</div>
